dict.string: **This is a mandatory field** Restrict this field to 2 characters.
*This is an optional field* Provide the name of the image that has been added to Media Files -> Media.xcassets
**This is a mandatory field** Acceptable values - [ intervention, assessment, readOnly ]
**This is a mandatory field** This should be a unique value
*This is an optional field* Provide the name of the file with the extension which has been added to Media Files -> filesForImageURL
**This is a mandatory field** Acceptable values - [ adherence, greaterThan, greaterThanOrEqual, lessThan, lessThanOrEqual, equal, rangeInclusive, rangeExclusive ]
**This is a mandatory field** Acceptable values - [tip, alert, plain]

*This is an optional field* Acceptable values - [heart, accessibility, activeLife, adultLearning, awareness, blood, bloodPressure, cardio, childLearning, dentalHealth, femaleHealth, hearing, homeCare, infantCare, laboratory, maleHealth, maternalHealth, medication, mentalHealth, neuro, nutrition, optometry, pediatrics, physicalTherapy, podiatry, respiratoryHealth, scale, stethoscope, syringe ]
**This is a mandatory field** acceptable values - [ careTeam, personal ]
*This is an optional field* Provide the name of the image that has been added to Media Files -> Media.xcassets
*This is an optional field* Provide the name of the image that has been added to Media Files -> Media.xcassets
*This is an optional field* Provide the name of the image that has been added to Media Files -> Media.xcassets
